author: peti7788
title: The fire chief has to go on foot
review:
It looks like a promotional set. Incidentally, in 1981, it was re-marketed as a new set, called 6602 Fire Unit 1.

Most of the values in the set are minifigure and stickers, the rest are just basic bricks. We got a vehicle that is not size compatible with the minifigure. 

The play value is low, you can't do anything with the minifigure, don't have equipment, not even an fire ax. The car can only roll, that's all.

In 1978, most sets were fire-themed, more so than police sets, today the exact opposite. Instead of the 5 undeveloped firefighting sets, I would have rather done three, but it would be fully minifigure compatible. 

I would have discarded this set and the 620.  And the 672/556 set should have been made minifigure compatible.

A 640 set would be better for a fire chief set.
